Description: Fragment of oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora to moderate turn. Clay fine light red-brown; cream slip. Leaf-shaped stamp.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 28a, 6. Name Epigonos. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0347.40.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0636)
